rows.label: tev024301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wendy about the attack on Earth.

rows.label: tev024301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Wendy if she has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Wendy for her thoughts on the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Wendy for her thoughts on the Prone.

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Wendy what she did during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev024301_SEL0061
rows.name:
Ask Wendy for her thoughts on
the xenoforms living in NLA.

rows.label: tev024301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Wendy if she has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0001
rows.name:
The sight of those xeno scum laying waste to Earth is
something I will never be able to forget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0002
rows.name:
It took all of a second for their lasers to wipe my
hometown off the map.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0003
rows.name:
When I boarded the White Whale, I remember thinking
that at least I still had my son.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0004
rows.name:
But he was a soldier who was sent out on a mission
from which he never returned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0005
rows.name:
You're young and strong, so please don't die.
Do whatever it takes to survive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Do you know Justin? The Mediator in the commercial
district? Now that's a young man you can count on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0009
rows.name:
He asked me if I needed any help, even though I
wasn't in the area he was assigned to patrol.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0010
rows.name:
He even promised to keep an eye on those kids across
the street who are always making such a racket in the
middle of the night![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0011
rows.name:
What sort of insensitive fool is throwing loud parties
at a time like this? Can you believe it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'll have to alert Justin the next time they get
rambunctious...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Did you know that late at night, that girl Lucia from
across the street gathers up groups of suspicious
characters and throws raucous get-togethers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Oh, I understand that when a group of young girls
get together, they can become quite boisterous.
I was young once too, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0019
rows.name:
But she also has those strange Ma-non xenos
coming to her parties![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0020
rows.name:
I don't know if it's supposed to be some sort of cultural
exchange or what, but I do know that it's extremely
dangerous behavior! Hmph![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Xenoforms are all crazed monsters, you know?
So what if they were to go berserk and start murdering
everyone?! I just can't stop thinking about it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Did you know that late at night, that girl Lucia from
across the street gathers groups of suspicious characters
and throws raucous get-togethers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0027
rows.name:
And not only is she inviting over Ma-non, but those
revolting Prone creatures as well! You simply wouldn't
BELIEVE how noisy they can be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Haven't numerous BLADEs lost their lives to those
Prone creatures?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0029
rows.name:
And now that they claim to want our friendship,
we just throw open the gates to the city? Hmph!
How blind can the government be?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0030
rows.name:
If we wait until they give us a reason to throw them
out, it will already be too late![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0035
rows.name:
I hid myself in my house as soon as I heard the
warning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0036
rows.name:
But that Lucia from across the street pulled me out of
my home—against my will, mind you—and evacuated
me to the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0037
rows.name: Bah. Like I need filthy xenos looking after me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0038
rows.name:
Still, I can't believe that girl would try to save me after
how much I've complained about her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0045
rows.name:
I finally relented to that girl Lucia from across the street
and agreed to attend one of her late-night...gatherings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0046
rows.name:
She called it her "girl's night," but it was more like a
xeno freak show if you ask me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0047
rows.name:
But after talking to them, I could appreciate how they
share our desire to live in peace—despite their different
culture, and attitudes, and...appearances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG0048
rows.name:
But that Lucia! Worrying so much about an old lady
who never leaves her house after she lost her son...
She really is the biggest busybody in the universe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG1001
rows.name:
Do you know that Mediator Justin who patrolled in
the commercial district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG1002
rows.name:
He always used to come all the way over here just
to make sure I was okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG1003
rows.name:
I was absolutely devastated when I heard that he was
the criminal behind those terrible incidents![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024301_MSG1004
rows.name:
I guess that just because you're a fellow human being
doesn't necessarily make you a good person.[ST:wait ]
